data.name: Anodos
data.detailed_description:
Will you escape the mind-bending tower of Anodos?

Finding yourself imprisoned inside a bizarre interdimensional tower is unfortunate, though it does happen. But what did you do? And why is your only friend a frozen chicken breast? No time to tell. Here in Anodos, just one thing is certain: the only way out is up.



Explore 200+ unique animated environments on your quest to the top:



Make creepy friends and unhelpful acquaintances along the way.



Uncover a lore-rich story soaked in trippy and generally deranged events:



Pleasure your ears with Land Loaf's experimental electronic score:



Category: Visual novel
Gameplay: Kinetic
Genre: Sci-fi
Vibe: Psychedelic adventure
Length: 5 hours

data.short_description: A kinetic visual novel featuring questionable meats, weird friends, and irresponsibly bizarre adventures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 92Hz

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 92Hz

content_descriptors.notes: Contains blood, mild graphic violence, disturbing scenes, and mature language.
